title: Most fascinating team during NFL combine; Top-5 prospects; Kyler's camp vs. Cardinals; Brad Holmes and Jason LichtMost fascinating team during NFL combine; Top-5 prospects; Kyler's camp vs. Cardinals; Brad Holmes and Jason Licht
itunes:title: Most fascinating team during NFL combine; Top-5 prospects; Kyler's camp vs. Cardinals; Brad Holmes and Jason LichtMost fascinating team during NFL combine; Top-5 prospects; Kyler's camp vs. Cardinals; Brad Holmes and Jason Licht
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, James Palmer and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson open up sharing their opinion on the most fascinating NFL teams during combine week. Then Peter Schrager shares his top-5 prospects of the NFL draft and then the crew reacts to the situation between Kyler Murray and the Arizona Cardinals. The show finishes up with Peter Schrager being joined by Detroit Lions GM Brad Holmes and Tampa Bay Buccaneers GM Jason Licht.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
